title: Polygon.io
description: Obtaining accurate, reliable, real-time financial market data is incredibly difficult. Getting that data into a consistent and easy to use format is even more so.   At Polygon.io we've set out to handle the heavy lifting for developers so they can spend less time worrying about data and more time creating applications.   Today, our platform provides developers with frictionless access to the most accurate historical and real-time data available, and we are now on our way to solving even more complex problems...a
